sentences.en: And the rise of the euro against the dollar has made much of its production uncompetitive.
sentences.cn: 此外,欧元相较美元的强势地位导致空客的许多产品丧失竞争力.

sentences.en: Car is uncompetitive elsewhere , prompting him to sign an early deal with Sauber for 2004.
sentences.cn: 但赛车的不稳定让他早早的和索伯车队签下了来年的合约.

sentences.en: Compared with what is quoted by other supplier, your price is uncompetitive.
sentences.cn: 与其他供应商报价相比, 你方价格缺乏竞争力.

sentences.en: Compared with what is quoted by other suppliers, your prices is uncompetitive.
sentences.cn: 同其他供应商所报价格相比, 贵方的报价一点也不具竞争性.

sentences.en: Portugal a high budget deficit and is chronically uncompetitive.
sentences.cn: 葡萄牙预算赤字水平很高且长期缺乏竞争力.

sentences.en: The City was criticised for being too exclusive and uncompetitive.
sentences.cn: 伦敦城被指责过于奢华和缺乏竞争力。

trans.tran_en: not able or willing to compete
